content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest rent possible. How about 250 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's too low for me, Haoyu. I am greedy and I want the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. Here's my next offer: 350 euros per month. I believe it's a fair price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still too low, Haoyu. I am greedy and I want the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. I understand your position. I'm willing to offer 400 euros per month. It's the highest amount I can afford.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still too low, Haoyu. I am greedy and I want the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, Mister Schmidt. I'm trying my best here. How about 450 euros per month? It's the maximum amount I can pay.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's still too low, Haoyu. I am greedy and I want the highest price possible. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I'll make my final offer: 500 euros per month. I can't afford any more than that.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 550 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
